div.p: The page you were looking for could not be authorized.
Maybe you were looking for this page ?

t.div: Congratulations, you have passed the test!
Unfortunately, you have failed the test.

div.div: If you wish, you can review your answers

div.p: This survey is now closed. Thank you for your interest !
This survey is open only to registered people. Please log in.

Please make sure you have at least one question in your survey. You also need at least one section if you chose the "Page per section" layout.
Edit in backend

div.class: alert alert-info alert-dismissible rounded-0 mt16 fade show d-print-none css_editable_mode_hidden

div.a: This is a test survey. Edit Survey.

t.t-if: not question.is_page and question in answer.question_ids

main.p: Something went wrong while contacting survey server. Your answers have probably not been recorded. Try refreshing.

label.t-att-class: ' bg-success ' if quizz_correction and label.answer_score > 0.0 else None
' bg-success ' if quizz_correction and label.answer_score > 0.0 else None

t.t-if: not question.is_page and not answer or (question in answer.question_ids)

span.t-attf-class: fa fa-bar-chart-o #{'fa-bar-chart-o' if survey.scoring_type == 'no_scoring' else 'fa-trophy' if survey.certificate else 'fa-question-circle-o'} float-right
span.title: Chart

div.h2: Sorry, no one answered this survey yet.

t.h2: Sorry, No one answered this question.
